other_tests.findings: Elevated right-sided filling pressures, hypokinesis of the right ventricle, moderate pulmonary hypertension.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Remained elevated at this level when rechecked several months later.

other_tests.procedure_name: Factor V Leiden and Prothrombin Gene Mutation Testing
other_tests.findings: Negative for both Factor V Leiden and Prothrombin gene mutations.

other_tests.procedure_name: Protein C, Protein S, and Antithrombin Levels Testing
other_tests.date: Several weeks after warfarin was discontinued
other_tests.findings: Functional levels of Protein C, Protein S, and Antithrombin were normal.
